name: Xaero’s World Map Configuration File
summary: An XWMC file is a settings file used by Xaero's World Map, a Minecraft mod that adds an interactive world map to the game. It stores map settings for a world in the Xaero’s World Map Configuration (XWMC) format. XWMC files include custom waypoints, zoom levels, and map display options specific to each Minecraft world a user explores with the mod.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Mojang Minecraft with Xaero's World Map installed

macos.display_name: Mojang Minecraft with Xaero's World Map installed
